info.welcome2: Hello! Welcome to the frostlands, a pack of levels made for more experenced players, So you haven't already, I suggest playing the main storymode first. Anyways, good luck!
info.Fish: Collect all the fish in this level to be able to reach the exit!
info.Ftwo: Blocks in the way aren't vanishing? That means you didn't collect all fish. Try again

npc.rad-A: The snow here is like, all purple and stuff... super weird. Also be sure to talk to sam, he wants to show you something.
npc.Sam-A: Oh- hello there. For some reason the normally peacefull frostlands have become purple, and much more dangerous. So I would suggest taking the muffin from that block, to help you out.
npc.fire-A: Hey, im the one managing the port at the moment. I don't have any boats, but I do have a few items for you.
npc.fire-B: I heard if you walk to the Left of the first Forest level, there's some magical ruins. When I have the chance, im gonna go check it out for myself.
npc.mrq: Hai! I'm Marqies. Welcome to the Doll shrine! Something Cool is in this box.
npc.Frost: Oh, hello there tux. I need to inform you of something. Above the level roots, there's a few hidden levels. One of them even has a powerup not normal found in the frostlands, the air feather. go check it out
npc.mrq2: Looks like something or someone is on the burger place, I wonder how they got up there
npc.mark2: After many years, I discovered a new kind of powerup, a kind never seen before on the frostlands up unitil this point. What? You've seen this before?
npc.brg-flame: I think these burgers would be better if they were actually.. You know.. Cooked.
npc.brg-terry: Hey hey hey! Welcome to my Ice-burger shop! It's a fresh fish in a bun! ....and also a little cheese. Care to try one?
npc.nin: Hey! what are you doing up here??
npc.slm: May I offer you a cup of tea? No? Well that's too bad.

devcom.chance: FrostC:The first level made for Frostlands. And tbh, it's pretty good, even compared to many of the recent levels.
devcom.roots: FrostC: This level is a combo of a bunch levels from the original Supertux. Also, random fact. This level was created after all the other ones on the purple ice island.
devcom.distaste: FrostC: When I orignally made this level, I didn't like it that much. Which is actually the reason I made blast off, to give players another option if they found this level too hard. However, after a few adjustments and changes I actually started to like the level a lot more
devcom.move: FrostC: What are you doing reading this??? RUN!!!!!
devcom.secret: FrostC: Originally. there was going to be a level after this that used all the gimmics from all the previous levels. That level was going to be the final frostlands level, however I just couldn't make it work. Also there's a coin in the pipe next to you
devcom.two: FrostC: If it wasn't obvious from this first room, this level takes heavy insperation from levels in Super mario bros the lost levels, mainly 1-1.
devcom.skillissue: FrostC: yes, it is possible to beat this level without getting hurt. I've done it a few times ;)
devcom.lazy: FrostC: Im gonna let you in on a secret... I don't like making levels with the forest tiles. So I made a ice level for the forest world. So yeah, take that as you will.
